title: Balthazar's Experiment
content:
xperiment Objectives

Deal with Balthazar's ritual circle.

We found a strange ritual circle hidden in a secret workshop within Balthazar's chambers. Gale was able to understand the strange sigils used to cast it, and says it was used to create the Moonlanterns that protect their wielders from the shadow curse.
